entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's wand is placed on the ground by Harry. ("He stepped to the pool’s edge and placed Hermione’s wand on the ground, still lit.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry jumps into the cold water. ("Then, trying not to imagine how much colder he was about to become or how violently he would soon be shivering, he jumped.")

relationships.description: Harry owns Hermione's wand. ("Hermione’s wand on the ground")
